死，死亡；枯萎；失去活力（die的ing形式）

死；死一样的状态；无精打采

word_group.phrase: a matter of life or death

word_group.brief_definition: 死刑；死刑判决；死亡判决
丧钟声；丧钟；完结的信号
造成企业必然失败的行动
死过人的房屋；太平间；停尸间；死囚室

bilingual.source: The car accident resulted in the death of two passengers.
bilingual.target: 车祸导致两名乘客死亡。
他对死亡感到非常害怕。

bilingual.source: Her death made us all very sad.
bilingual.target: 她的死亡让我们都很悲伤。

bilingual.source: He narrowly escaped death in the accident.
bilingual.target: 他在事故中险些逃过死亡。

bilingual.source: He was very sick, almost at death's door.
bilingual.target: 他病得很重，几乎濒临死亡。

bilingual.source: The death of her pet made her very sad.
bilingual.target: 她的宠物的死亡让她非常难过。

bilingual.source: The medical examiner determined the time of death.
The death toll from the war is heartbreaking.
bilingual.target: 战争的死亡人数让人心痛。

bilingual.source: The tree was at death's door due to the drought.
bilingual.target: 那棵树因为干旱濒临死亡。

list.abstract: Death（英 [deθ]，美 [deθ]），英语单词，作名词为死；死亡；死神。短语搭配有sudden infant death syndrome（婴儿猝死）。例句为“Silence is death for any idea.（沉默对任何想法都是致命的。）” Death相关近义词有destruction、dying，相关反义词有birth。
Death乐队，成立于1983年，DEATH乐队被很多媒体推崇为第一支死亡金属乐队，他们的演奏技巧，编曲和音乐的整体表现手法极大地丰富了死亡金属的素材，对后来的乐队产生了非常重要的影响。

yingyinNormal.en: Blood! Blood! Blood! And death!
yingyinNormal.zh: 流血！血！血！和死亡！

yingyinNormal.en: Mufasa's death is a terrible tragedy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 木法沙的死亡是个可怕的悲剧。

yingyinNormal.en: You defended me courageously even in the face of death.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你勇敢地保护我，即使面对死亡。

yingyinNormal.en: The initial death toll will shake world governments to their core.
yingyinNormal.zh: 初期死亡人数足以震惊到世界政府的核心。

yingyinNormal.en: Blood, blood, blood! And death. All right, you know you're milking it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 流血，血，血，和死亡。好了，好了，强行抢戏吗。

yingyinNormal.en: Enlighten me again. The purpose to experience fear. Fear in the face of certain death.
yingyinNormal.zh: 再教教我。恐惧的经历，直面死亡的恐惧。

yingyinNormal.en: Look, not so long ago I was on a mission that meant certain death, my death! And now I'm back, in a nice warm office, with my big brother and are those ginger nuts? Oh, God. LOVE ginger nuts.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不久前，我还在执行死亡任务，我的死亡，现在我回来了，在一间温暖的办公室里，和我的哥哥，还有，那是姜饼吗？上帝啊，爱死姜饼了。

yingyinNormal.en: We must put aside all talks of death, and focus on birth. The birth of a new age.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们不要谈论死亡，而要关注诞生。新时代的诞生。

yingyinNormal.en: I want death. Get off my case, Mathilda. I'm tired of your games.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我选择死亡，玛蒂尔达，放过我吧，我对你的游戏已经感到厌倦了。

yingyinNormal.en: I do not question, Gul'dan. But the fel is born of death, must have a price.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我并无此意，古尔丹，但魔能与死亡相伴，势必付出代价。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, she was never short of surprises. She wasn't gonna let death get in the way of her job.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她这人总是不乏惊喜。她不会让死亡阻止她工作。

yingyinNormal.en: I'd hate to be responsible for the death of a family member. Wouldn't you agree, Simba?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不喜欢为家族成员的死亡来负责，你同意吗？辛巴。

yingyinNormal.en: Kill me. It wouldn't help. The human body is capable of being flatulent for hours after death.
yingyinNormal.zh: 杀了我吧。没用的，人体能在死亡数小时内一直制造气体。

yingyinNormal.en: Ross, where are you going? To talk to Rachel. Isn't that why we took a ride in the death cab?
yingyinNormal.zh: 罗斯！你去哪里？去找瑞秋啊，所以我才坐死亡计程车来的。

yingyinNormal.en: He poisoned the water supply, bringing on the dark ages. Death and disease and suffering ran rampant.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他在水源下了毒，带来了黑暗时期，死亡，疾病，肆意猖獗。

yingyinNormal.en: What happened? Well, poor boy had a fit. Locked himself in his room and built a sonic death ray.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然后呢？发作了呀。把自己锁在屋里，做了个音速死亡放射线仪。

yingyinNormal.en: And what they find is a single-point mutation in a gene responsible for controlling programmed cell death.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然后他们在控制程序性细胞死亡的基因上发现一个单点突变。

yingyinNormal.en: Don't you be afraid, Sweet heart. Death is just a part of life. Something we're all destined to do.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你不用害怕，宝贝，死亡只是生命的一部分，是我们注定要面对的。

yingyinNormal.en: Death, that is what you will bring upon us. Dragonfire and ruin. If you awaken that beast, it will destroy us all.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你只会带来死亡，龙火和毁灭吵醒了那怪物，我们就全完了。

yingyinNormal.en: Then what's this? What's that date? Is that a birth day? Is that a death day? I don't know yet.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是什么？这个日期代表什么？出生日期？还是死亡日期？目前还不清楚。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 死；死亡；死神；死去；结束；毁灭；终止；破灭
adj. 致死的；致命的；乏味的；恶狠狠的；充满仇恨的；完全的；极度地；极准的；有效的；巧妙的
adj. 死的；完全的；绝对的；麻木的；过时的；熄灭的；无生物的；无知觉的；冷漠的；不再有关的

word_family.mean: v. 死；死亡；渴望；非常想要；达到性高潮；灭；灭绝；相继死去；被遗忘；为…捐躯

sense_info_list.en: the action or fact of dying or being killed; the end of the life of a person or organism

examination_example.sentence: Any such heretics that continued to spread these lies were to be punished by imprisonment or even <highlight>death</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 任何继续传播这些谎言的异教徒都将受到监禁甚至死刑的惩罚。

examination_example.sentence: They had played no part since the <highlight>death</highlight> of Euripides.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 自从欧里庇德斯去世后，它们就再也没有发挥过作用了。

examination_example.sentence: And the ban on ultra-thin models seems to go beyond protecting models from starving themselves to <highlight>death</highlight> — as some have done.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对超瘦模特的禁令似乎不仅仅是为了防止模特饿死——有些模特就是这样做的。

sense_info_list.en: the destruction or permanent end of something; a damaging or destructive state of affairs

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 死刑；死刑判决；死亡判决

sense_info_list.en: the action or fact of dying or being killed; the end of the life of a person or organism

examination_example.sentence: Their annual <highlight>death</highlight> rate is about twice that of the global average.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们的每年死亡率是全球平均水平的两倍。

examination_example.sentence: He was granted over 200 patents and continued to pioneer rocket technology until his <highlight>death</highlight> in 1945.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他获得了200多项专利，并继续开拓火箭技术，直到1945年去世。

examination_example.sentence: This was the first recorded <highlight>death</highlight> involving a car which was supposed to be fully autonomous.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是第一次有记录的涉及全自动驾驶汽车的死亡事件。

examination_example.sentence: Two months before he died, newspapers were reporting that he was working on a "<highlight>death</highlight> ray".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在他去世前两个月，报纸报道他正在研究“死亡射线”。

sense_info_list.en: the destruction or permanent end of something; a damaging or destructive state of affairs

examination_example.sentence_trans: 沉默对任何想法都是致命的。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 垂死的；即将死亡的；濒临消亡的；快要消失的；临终时的；最后的；快要结束的
n. 死；死亡；死神；死去；结束；毁灭；终止；破灭
adj. 致死的；致命的；乏味的；恶狠狠的；充满仇恨的；完全的；极度地；极准的；有效的；巧妙的
adj. 死的；完全的；绝对的；麻木的；过时的；熄灭的；无生物的；无知觉的；冷漠的；不再有关的

word_family.mean: v. 死；死亡；渴望；非常想要；达到性高潮；灭；灭绝；相继死去；被遗忘；为…捐躯

sense_info_list.en: the action or fact of dying or being killed; the end of the life of a person or organism

examination_example.sentence: According to the World Health Organization, 80 percent of <highlight>deaths</highlight> from heart disease and stroke are caused by high blood pressure, tobacco use, elevated cholesterol and low consumption of fruits and vegetables.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据世界卫生组织的数据，80%死于心脏病和中风的人是由高血压、吸烟、胆固醇升高以及水果和蔬菜食用过少引起的。

examination_example.sentence: His manuals including The Royal Parisian Baker and the massive five-volume Art of French Cooking Series (1833-1847, completed after his <highlight>death</highlight>) first systematized many basic principles of cooking, complete with drawings and step-by-step directions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他的手册包括 Royal Parisian Baker 和庞大的五卷法国烹饪艺术系列(1833-1847，在他去世后完成)，首先系统化了许多烹饪的基本原理，并附有图纸和分步指导。

examination_example.sentence: One of the risk factors for premature <highlight>deaths</highlight> is the air we breathe, over which individuals have little control.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 过早死亡的危险因素之一是我们呼吸的空气，而个人对空气的控制力很小。

sense_info_list.en: the destruction or permanent end of something; a damaging or destructive state of affairs

direction_info.description:

examination_example.sentence: The people who exercise 150 minutes a week did pretty well, too, lowering their <highlight>death</highlight> risk by 14%.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每周锻炼150分钟的人表现得很好，他们的死亡风险降低了14%。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

examination_example.sentence: After Dr. Wu Mengchao's <highlight>death</highlight>, people in Shanghai held all kinds of activities in memory of him.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 吴孟超博士去世后，上海市民举行了各种活动来纪念他。

examination_example.sentence: He doesn' t mind the matter of life or <highlight>death</highlight>.
